actions.text: Reported to House by House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.  Report No: 97-91.
Rule Granted Providing an Open Rule with 1 Hour of Debate.
Rules Committee Resolution H.Res.225 Reported to House.

Laid on Table in House by Voice Vote.
Other Measure S.1209 Passed House in Lieu.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Buildings and Grounds

official_title: A bill authorizing appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the John F. Kennedy Center Act to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1982 for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, including maintenance, security, and janitorial services.

titles.title: A bill authorizing appropriations to the Secretary of the Interior for services necessary to the nonperforming arts functions of the John F. Kennedy Center for the Performing Arts, and for other purposes.
